entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sutton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:31 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind west 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 7.
